## Installation

### Windows
```bash
# Download and extract the release
# Or build from source:
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/FileOrganizer.git
cd FileOrganizer
dotnet build -c Release
```

### Linux/macOS
```bash
# Download and extract the release
# Or build from source:
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/FileOrganizer.git
cd FileOrganizer
dotnet build -c Release
```
